verses.verse: <S%H1732>David<s%> therefore <S%H3212>departed<s%> thence, and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> to the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H5725>Adullam<s%>: and when his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and all his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, they went <S%H3381>down<s%> thither to him.

And every <S%H376>one<s%> that was in <S%H4689>distress<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> that was in <S%H5378>debt<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> that was <S%H4751%H5315>discontented<s%>, <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves unto him; and he became a <S%H8269>captain<s%> over them: and there were with him about <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> thence to <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, Let my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother<s%>, I pray thee, come <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and be with you, till I <S%H3045>know<s%> what <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> for me.

And he <S%H5148>brought<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: and they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with him all the <S%H3117>while<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was in the <S%H4686>hold<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3427>Abide<s%> not in the <S%H4686>hold<s%>; <S%H3212>depart<s%>, and <S%H935>get<s%> thee into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>. Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H2802>Hareth<s%>.

¶ When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3045>discovered<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> that were with him, (now <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> under a <S%H815>tree<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah<s%>, having his <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> were <S%H5324>standing<s%> about him;)

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%> that <S%H5324>stood<s%> about him, Hear <S%H8085>now<s%>, ye <S%H1145>Benjamites<s%>; will the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> every one of you <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, and <S%H7760>make<s%> you all <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>;

That all of you have <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against me, and there is none that <S%H1540%H241>sheweth<s%> me that my <S%H1121>son<s%> hath made a <S%H3772>league<s%> with the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, and there is none of you that is <S%H2470>sorry<s%> for me, or <S%H1540%H241>sheweth<s%> unto me that my <S%H1121>son<s%> hath stirred <S%H6965>up<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> against me, to lie in <S%H693>wait<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>?

¶ Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%>, which was <S%H5324>set<s%> over the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H5011>Nob<s%>, to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>.

And he <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for him, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H6720>victuals<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, and all his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that were in <S%H5011>Nob<s%>: and they <S%H935>came<s%> all of them to the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> now, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>. And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, Here I am, my <S%H113>lord<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Why have ye <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against me, thou and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, in that thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and hast <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for him, that he should <S%H6965>rise<s%> against me, to lie in <S%H693>wait<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>?

Then <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, And who is so <S%H539>faithful<s%> among all thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> as <S%H1732>David<s%>, which is the <S%H4428>king's<s%> son in <S%H2860>law<s%>, and <S%H5493>goeth<s%> at thy <S%H4928>bidding<s%>, and is <S%H3513>honourable<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house<s%>?

Did I <S%H3117>then<s%> <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for him? be it far from <S%H2486>me<s%>: let not the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7760>impute<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, nor to all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>: for thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%> of all this, <S%H6996>less<s%> or <S%H1419>more<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou shalt <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%>, thou, and all thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H7323>footmen<s%> that <S%H5324>stood<s%> about him, <S%H5437>Turn<s%>, and <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; because their <S%H3027>hand<s%> also is with <S%H1732>David<s%>, and because they <S%H3045>knew<s%> when he <S%H1272>fled<s%>, and did not <S%H1540%H241>shew<s%> it to me. But the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not put <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1673>Doeg<s%>, <S%H5437>Turn<s%> thou, and <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon the <S%H3548>priests<s%>. And <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%>, and he <S%H6293>fell<s%> upon the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%> that did <S%H5375>wear<s%> a <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

And <S%H5011>Nob<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H5221>smote<s%> he with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, both <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>, <S%H5768>children<s%> and <S%H3243>sucklings<s%>, and <S%H7794>oxen<s%>, and <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

¶ And <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>, <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H54>Abiathar<s%>, <S%H4422>escaped<s%>, and <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.
And <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> <S%H5046>shewed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H2026>slain<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H54>Abiathar<s%>, I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it that <S%H3117>day<s%>, when <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%> was there, that he would <S%H5046>surely<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>: I have <S%H5437>occasioned<s%> the death of all the <S%H5315>persons<s%> of thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

<S%H3427>Abide<s%> thou with me, <S%H3372>fear<s%> not: for he that <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>: but with me thou shalt be in <S%H4931>safeguard<s%>.
